algorithm

类 ClusteringBasedActiveLearning

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.ActiveLearning
      • algorithm.ClusteringBasedActiveLearning
  • 直接已知子类:
    ClusteringAlgorithmsBasedActiveLearning

    public class ClusteringBasedActiveLearning
extends ActiveLearning
    Clustering-based active learning. The clustering algorithm should be specified.

    Author: Fan Min minfanphd@163.com, minfan@swpu.edu.cn
    Copyright: The source code and all documents are open and free. PLEASE keep this header while revising the program.
    Organization: Lab of Machine Learning, Southwest Petroleum University, Chengdu 610500, China.
    Project: The cost-sensitive active learning project.

    Progress: Almost finished, further revision is possible.
    Written time: June 20, 2019.
    Last modify time: July 21, 2019.

                                     int paraDistanceMeasure,
                                     boolean paraNormalizeData,
                                     boolean paraDisorderData,
                                     double paraAdaptiveRatio,
                                     int paraInstanceSelectionStrategy,
                                     int paraQueryAmountStrategy)
        The constructor.
        参数:
        paraFilename - The given file.
        paraDistanceMeasure - The given distance measure in integer.
        paraDisorderData - Disorder data or not.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setClusteringAlgorithm

        public void setClusteringAlgorithm(int paraAlgorithm)
        Set the current algorithm.
        参数:
        paraAlgorithm - The given algorithm.

      • setInstanceSelectionStrategy

        public void setInstanceSelectionStrategy(int paraInstanceSelectionStrategy)
        Set the instance selection strategy.
        参数:
        paraInstanceSelectionStrategy - The given strategy.

      • initializeDensityPeaksGaussian

        public void initializeDensityPeaksGaussian()
        Initialize densityPeaksGaussian for instance selection. It is more often employed for independent running based on one clustering algorithm such as kMeans. Please refer to the main method of this class.

      • setQueryAmountStrategy

        public void setQueryAmountStrategy(int paraQueryAmountStrategy)
        Set the query amount strategy.
        参数:
        paraQueryAmountStrategy - The given strategy.

      • selectCriticalAndLabel

        public void selectCriticalAndLabel(int[] paraBlock,
                                   int paraTotalLabels)
                            throws LabelUsedUpException,
                                   DuplicateQueryException
        Select critical instances and label.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        paraTotalLables - The number of labels (including already obtained ones).
        抛出:
        LabelUsedUpException
        DuplicateQueryException

      • selectCriticalDensityPeaks

        public void selectCriticalDensityPeaks(int[] paraBlock,
                                       int paraRequiredLabels,
                                       boolean paraIsFirst,
                                       int paraFirstLabel)
                                throws LabelUsedUpException,
                                       DuplicateQueryException
        Select critical instances using the density peaks algorithm.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        paraRequiredLabels - Required labels (not including already obtained ones).
        paraIsFirst - Is the first labeled instance? Or has any instance be labeled in this block?
        paraFirstLabel - The first label for deciding pure or not.
        抛出:
        LabelUsedUpException
        DuplicateQueryException

      • selectCriticalMaxTotalDistance

        public void selectCriticalMaxTotalDistance(int[] paraBlock,
                                           int paraRequiredLabels,
                                           boolean paraIsFirst,
                                           int paraFirstLabel)
                                    throws LabelUsedUpException,
                                           DuplicateQueryException
        Select critical instances with the maximal distance from labeled ones.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        paraRequiredLabels - Required labels (not including already obtained ones).
        paraIsFirst - Is the first labeled instance? Or has any instance be labeled in this block?
        paraFirstLabel - The first label for deciding pure or not.
        抛出:
        LabelUsedUpException
        DuplicateQueryException

      • clusterInTwo

        public int[][] clusterInTwo(int[] paraBlock,
                            int paraAlgorithmIndex)
                     throws UnableToClusterInKException
        Cluster the given block in two using density peaks.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        返回:
        Two blocks
        抛出:
        UnableToClusterInKException - If the clustered result contains only one block (the other is empty).

      • getQueriedArray

        public int[] getQueriedArray(int[] paraBlock)
        Cluster the given block in two using density peaks.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        返回:
        Two blocks
        抛出:
        UnableToClusterInKException - If the clustered result contains only one block (the other is empty).

      • clusterInTwo

        public int[][] clusterInTwo(int[] paraBlock)
                     throws UnableToClusterInKException
        Cluster the given block in two using density peaks.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        返回:
        Two blocks
        抛出:
        UnableToClusterInKException - If the clustered result contains only one block (the other is empty).

      • labelSmallBlock

        public void labelSmallBlock(int[] paraBlock)
                     throws LabelUsedUpException,
                            DuplicateQueryException
        Label small block directly.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if no more query is admitted.
        LabelUsedUpException
        DuplicateQueryException

      • classifyIfPure

        boolean classifyIfPure(int[] paraBlock)
        Classify this block if it has labeled instances and is pure.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        返回:
        Pure or not.

      • classifyByVotings

        void classifyByVotings(int[] paraBlock)
        Classify this block by voting. It is not a good strategy. We may use 1NN instead. In case no label has been queried, the default label will be 0.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.

      • getNumBlocks

        public int getNumBlocks()
        Get the number of blocks.
        返回:
        The the number of blocks.

      • getBlockPureThreshold

        public int getBlockPureThreshold(int paraBlockLength)
        How many labels are enough to say that the block is pure? Now the strategy is sqrt(n). Attention: We may implement other strategies in the future.
        参数:
        paraBlockLength - The length of the block.
        返回:
        The threshold.

      • oneNnUnhandled

        public void oneNnUnhandled(int[] paraBlock)
        Classify unhandled instances using 1NN. The neighbor should be in the same block. In case no label has been queried, the default label will be 0.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.

      • learn

        public java.lang.String learn()
        Learn. The most important process. This method takes advantage of a queue for unfinished blocks.
        覆盖:
        learn 在类中 ActiveLearning
        参数:
        paraBlock - The current block.

      • sameQueriesOneNn

        public double sameQueriesOneNn()
        1NN classification using the same queries as the active learner. For test only!
        返回:
        The accuracy.

      • areBlocksImbalance

        public static boolean areBlocksImbalance(int[][] paraBlocks)
        Are the given blocks imbalance?
        参数:
        paraBlocks - The given blocks. Should be exactly two blocks.
        返回:
        Imbalance or not.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Test this class.
